alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 29 at 11:50AM CDT until March 30 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 7 PM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sustained winds of 25-35 mph or greater with gusts up to 55 mph is expected outside of thunderstorms. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Louisiana, central and south Mississippi and southeast Arkansas. * WHEN...From 9AM to 7PM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Downed trees and powerlines are likely and driving conditions will be hazardous.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that winds of 35 mph are expected. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution when driving. Wind gusts of 55 mph can bring down large limbs and rotted trees causing serious injury and property damage. Exercise caution when outdoors during these conditions. Secure outdoor objects.
